message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to offer $9,500 for it. I hope this proposal works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking to get closer to $11,000 for the product. Considering its worth to you, I believe this is a fair compromise. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I've given this some thought and am willing to increase my offer to $10,000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward.
